Start by selecting an Affinity and Card Type to generate stats!
Change the Lv (level) and Asc (ascension) values to see updates to stats
Reset stats by setting the level to 0
Stats increase by 5% per Lv (level)
Increasing Asc (ascension) will increase your man Lv (level) by 2
Guardians with affinity Robotic, Physical or Beast do physical damage that is greatly negated by Physical Defense
Guardians with affinity Elemental, Psychic or Brainiac do magical damage that is greatly negated by Magical Defense
Guardians with affinity Robotic, Physical or Beast rely on Str (strength) to deal damage to opponents
Guardians with affinity Elemental, Psychic or Brainiac rely on Wis (wisdom) to deal damage to opponents
Successful crit (critical) attacks will add an additional 20% bonus damage to overall damage dealt
IMPORTANT: Current stats are outdated! Stats do not regenerate automatically. Press the regenerate button to update stats

Burst is a lone wolf and mysterious. With no real name, enemies often call her \"Frost Fire\" because her energy weapons spit out blue fire! It is no secret that Burst spends her nights roaming the streets looking for bad guys, but what she does with the rest of her time is unknown.

Yu Gang can create boiling hot black oil residue, that secretes from his bones. He can toss this oil to burn, blind and even immobilize his opponents in a sticky goo that makes it nearly impossible to remove.
Jarvis Jones is very disciplined and despite having killed hundreds of people his moral compass is unfaltering. His intentions are good, they have always been. Even after an assassination.

Sabina has the ability to see future events. Her visions are never fluid, they are patchy and generally unclear. She can trigger a vision if needed, but they mostly come randomly and uncontrollably. She also has the power to briefly control time, however, this is an ability she has yet to master.

Jerik Johnson spends most of his time staring at the computer screen in a zombie-like trance. He is passive-aggressive, he rarely gets into physical confrontations. But while in front of his computer, he can destroy your life or even erase your entire existence with a couple keystrokes.

Very spiritual and down-to-earth. He is humble but fierce in his attack. Earth, life and family are what he loves and values most. He will do all that is required to protect everyone who dares to disturb what he stands for. His name translates as \“Cougar\” in English.

As one contemporaneous high-school peer observed, \"Brickjaw has a terrible identity problem, a marked inferiority complex and is only comfortable when making others uncomfortable.\" Brickjaw is dangerous not because he enjoys fighting, but because he both enjoys it and is very skilled at it.

Tera Harkenson has complete control over her hair, allowing her to freely alter, grow, change texture, color, shape and manipulate as if it was an appendage. She can weave her hair into different shapes, however, she generally uses her hair as additional knife wielding limbs.

Michael is stronger than the average human, but he does not have god-like powers. He uses his intelligence, and the initial horror that people have when they witness him to his advantage. He knows that he is not immune to death and this thought frightens him to his core.
Samuel is super strong and can withstand a tank\'s blast against him. Although his skin is as strong as titanium, he lacks combat abilities and knowledge.

Pain doesn\'t have powers or abilities, but he is very skilled in hand-to-hand combat and has an expertise in weaponry. He usually uses a sniper rifle, and mini-gun as a weapon. He wears a combat suit that hides his face.

Once a kind, gentle and proud woman, Massacre is now filled with blood rage! She is pure evil now, and causes destruction wherever she is. While the innocent cower at the sight of her menace, an alien being named Nervo has taken a special interest in her.

Nervo is a calm, collected individual who perseveres in patience. He\’d rather get to know his target, weaken them and strike when they are most vulnerable. It is an attribute he developed from fighting countless species on Helo.

Nysida is tired of those who only see the people of M\'ktor as a small group of weak people who only have healing abilities. She has vowed to increase her own power at any cost to prove to the world that M\'ktor is a place to be feared. Nysida will destroy all who get in her way of growing stronger and does not care who dies in the process.

Elriush, once known for kindness, has truly become to epitomize the archetype of a Mad King. He transitioned into power with only glory in mind and is now only a shadow of his former self. Elriush is not fit to rule his people. He still holds the title of King of M\'ktor but he wanders their homeland in a ghastly fashion with little to no emotion.

Lydae is hurt that her forested homeland of M\'ktor has been consumed by swampland, darkness and greed. She does not blame her father for her exile, but is instead saddened by how far he has fallen and how he has lost the light that their people once fought for. Fueled by nothing but misplaced love for her father and sister, Lydae strives to be like her mother and bring light back into the darkness.

Evelyn Cherry loves to mess with other students during her free time, it amuses her. She loves to draw, and hang out with her friends. She generally remains optimistic, but does have a mean side to her that only surfaces under dire circumstances.

Jackel\'s only gift is the gift of laughter. He is a master manipulator and can get anyone to do his bidding. However, the times when he does get his hands dirty the results are always gut wrenchingly disgusting!

Alan is calm, and is a bit courageous. He is very smart, and due to being able to understand the world around him, he has always understood how his abilities work. But how Alan got his abilities remains unknown.

Slade does not speak much, but when he does it is straight to the point and meaningful. He cares mostly about nature and it\'s balance. He can sense when there is an imbalance between human consumption and destruction and the replenishing of nature in the world.

With his madness and disfigurements, BoBo relies on the troupes of Klown Krew members who spend their downtime either in padded cells or mockingly luring victims into the shadows where BoBo lurks. Simply, he is pure evil.

Ashley Blue is serious throughout life, and has no sense of humor. When she is turns into the Beast, she is unable to speak any words and can rarely control herself until she tires. As a human, she is a little girl who is scared all the time.
Once Lina sets a goal, she obsessively works towards that goal. But this also works against her. When she is unable to obtain what she wants, she becomes blind with rage!

Huo Tian is subservient and loyal to whomever he is following, regardless of right or wrong. At times he can be temperamental and arrogant, but mostly he is quiet and always ready to set something (or someone) ablaze.

Madam Frost loves ice and hates fire, although she can\'t fly, she can ski on ice to travel to where ever she needs to go. She is unable to find love due to her ability to freeze anything she touches. She sometimes sobs randomly hoping to fall in love. She has a sense of humor and loves to toy with her enemy.

He doesn\’t wear any special suit he just tries to wear what the kids wear that is popular in school. He tries to look as normal as he can. He can produce and control fire, manipulating it into various weapons, but his favorite is the sword. He also learned to create basketball sized fireballs that he can throw around with incredible precision and speed.

Protector remains modest and believes he is guided by God. He feels passionate about fighting evil and protecting the innocent, but he also knows that he isn\'t perfect. He just does his best to make a difference in his own special way.
